casebody.data:
Max G. COHEN, as Trustee, etc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. A. SHAPIRO & SON, Inc., Defendant-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 20, 1924.) No. 31. David Haar, of New York City, for plaintiff-respondent. Barnett E. Kopelman, of New York City (Joseph G. M. Browne, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant-appellant.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MANTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
